title: Mirror Splash Art (Solved, Not a Bug)
body: Under the 5.21 patchnotes in the client menu, clicking on the Zombie Nunu link for upcoming skins will give you a mirrored splash art from the other links.

replies.body:
Not a bug, Nunu's splash art *is* a mirrored version.

This is fairly common on "group pictures", it was also done with some of the playing card skins (Ez's Ace of Spades, Morde's King of Clubs, etc)
Yup! We do flip a lot of the splash art for a better composition on the Champion Display Page, or the loading screen.
Thank you, wasn't aware of this.
